CustomField.description: SSF link for partner contacts. Contact must have a partner lookup and a sales rep for the link to generate
CustomField.formula: IF(( NOT( ISBLANK(Sales_Representative__c) ) && NOT( ISBLANK(Partner_Lookup__c) )), HYPERLINK("https://portal.perchenergy.com/apply/s/partnerswitch?salesrepID="&Sales_Representative__c&"&partnerId="&Partner_Lookup__c, "SSF Rep/Partner Link", "_blank"),NULL)
CustomField.label: SSF Link
